title: Chronicles of the Canongate, 1st Series
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: When he betook himselfto arms, the farm lay waste, and the Duke could find no other person whowould venture to take it; whereupon his Grace sent several messages toSteele, to know the reason why he kept the farm waste.
